title: Handle a Last-Minute Booking Inquiry
description: A company wants to book a small meeting room for 10 people for tomorrow.

tasks.description: Check the booking calendar for meeting room availability for the next day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that Meeting Room C is available.

tasks.description: Provide the client with the last-minute rental rate.
Confirm the booking and process the full payment immediately via credit card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent books the room and takes payment.

tasks.description: Notify the operations team of the last-minute booking so the room can be prepared.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends an urgent notification to the operations staff.
